note.p: Education: Nottingham; School of Science, South Kensington; Owen's College, Manchester; Christ's College, Cambridge. BA (1879), MA (1885), DSc (1892)

Career: Studied with Julius von Sachs (For Mem RS 1888) at Wurzburg and with Anton de Bary (For Mem RS 1884) at Strasbourg; investigated Coffee Leaf disease in Ceylon; Fellow of Christ's College, Cambridge; Professor of Botany, Royal Indian Engineering College, Cooper's Hill (Forestry Branch) (1885-1895); Professor of Botany, Cambridge (1895-1906); researched fungi
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series B 1910-1911 vol 83 pp i-xiv signed by W T T D
